front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions for Multipath Traffic Engineered Directed Acyclic Graph Tunnels

abstract.t: A Multipath Traffic Engineered Directed Acyclic Graph (MPTED) tunnel is a Traffic Engineering (TE) construct that facilitates weighted load balancing of unicast traffic across a constrained set of paths optimized for a specific objective. This document describes the provisioning of an MPTED Tunnel in a TE network using RSVP-TE.
